name: Innova Champion Destroyer
description: The Innova Champion Destroyer is a fast and stable distance driver designed for maximum distance off the tee. With a combination of speed, glide, and fade, this disc is perfect for players of all skill levels.

name: Dynamic Discs Truth
description: The Dynamic Discs Truth is a versatile midrange disc that can be used for a variety of shots. It has a straight flight path with a moderate amount of glide and a reliable fade at the end. This disc is perfect for both beginners and experienced players.

name: Latitude 64 Opto Sapphire
description: The Latitude 64 Opto Sapphire is a beginner-friendly distance driver that has a high degree of glide and a moderate amount of turn. This disc is great for players who are just starting out or who want to improve their distance.

name: Discraft Buzzz
description: The Discraft Buzzz is one of the most popular midrange discs on the market. It has a straight flight path with minimal fade, making it great for accurate shots. This disc is perfect for both beginners and experienced players.

name: MVP Neutron Photon
description: The MVP Neutron Photon is a high-speed distance driver with a reliable fade at the end of its flight. It has a good amount of glide and can handle a variety of wind conditions. This disc is perfect for experienced players who want to maximize their distance.
